oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Illyricvm
Illyricum
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zsámboki, János , 1531-1584
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Université de Paris IV: Paris-Sorbonne Équipe d'accueil "Voix anglophones : littérature et esthétique".
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ioan. Sambucus Ortelio suo, S Mitto hanc quòque tabellam qua nesessaria confinia Pannoniæ declarantur, fluviorum et aliquot locorum situs Hirschvogelii recte mutaui, Angelini autem studio plurima adieci, et inualla correxi, vt parum quis si cum Hirschvogelig hæc conjugat desiderarit si qui errores sint, dies certiora docebit.
Covers Istria (Romania), Croatia, Slovania, Bosnia and Hercegovina, Dalmatia, and Hungary.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale [ca. 1:950,000].
Balkan Peninsula
